title: Object Metadata
description: A schema for the Object Metadata

parentId.description: Required per 3.1.1: the ElementId of the parent object

hasChildren.description: Required per 3.1.1: boolean indicating if the element is composed of one or more child objects

namespaceUri.description: Required per 3.1.1: URI indicating the Namespace of the object

interpolation.description: Optional per 3.1.2: interpolation method if element value is interpolated rather than stored

engUnit.description: Optional per 3.1.2: engineering unit using UNECE Recommendation Number 20

attributeMetadata.description: Optional per 3.1.2: Additional information about how an object attribute is stored or treated by the underlying platform
